"My Set":
"About My Set

You can use this to save your current class and equipment as a Set. You can load a saved Set with \"Change to This Set\".

This will search your inventory and Storage for the saved equipment, so if your inventory is full and the item cannot be removed from Storage, it will not be equipped. Also, please note that if you do not meet the equip conditions for an item, it will not be equipped.
